meanings.sent1: I received a mailgram from my friend with exciting news.
meanings.sent2: The mailgram contained important information about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The mailgram was so unexpected that it made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a warm mailgram on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent5: The bright red envelope of the mailgram stood out in the mailbox.

meanings.definition: To send a message via mailgram.
meanings.sent1: I will mailgram the invitation to all the guests.
meanings.sent2: She decided to mailgram her family the good news.
meanings.sent3: He mailgrammed his boss a joke to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent4: The idea mailgrammed to her like a bolt of lightning.
meanings.sent5: They quickly mailgrammed the urgent message to headquarters.
